scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This folder contains receipts for John Wesley Hunt's purchases of goods, services, and mules; shipping lists; a note of deposit of $800 to the care of Hunt; receipts documenting deliveries of Hunt's bale rope to associates; a bill for butter for the Eastern Kentucky Lunatic Asylum; and a condolence letter to John Wesley and Catherine Hunt following the death of their daughter Catherine (May 25, 1833). The shipping lists document a variety of goods (e.g., sugar, glassware, tea, etc.) shipped to John Wesley Hunt in Lexington, Kentucky, from his associates in Maysville, Frankfort, and Louisville, Kentucky.
